org.mini2Dx.ui.element

Class ContentButton

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mini2Dx.ui.element.UiElement
      • org.mini2Dx.ui.element.Button
        • org.mini2Dx.ui.element.ContentButton
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Actionable, Hoverable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TabButton

    public class ContentButton
extends Button
    Implementation of Button that allows custom inner content
